item.description: Good tip, didn&apos;t know that function existed.  I would have to use with caution, however, as there are times during debugging certain issues that I have to turn on debugging in a production environment.  While this action would otherwise be invisible to the user, having this code throughout and seeing dumps everywhere would send most users into cardiac arrest!
